hints.label: lem-kinetic-lsi-established
hints.title: Hypocoercive LSI for Ψ_kin (Established)
hints.content:
7288: :label: lem-kinetic-lsi-established
7289: 
7290: The kinetic operator $\Psi_{\text{kin}}$ (Langevin dynamics) satisfies an LSI **with respect to its own invariant measure** $\pi_{\text{kin}}$:
7291: 
7292: $$
7293: \text{Ent}_{\pi_{\text{kin}}}(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}}^{\text{kin}} \cdot \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\text{kin}}}[|\nabla f|^2]
7294: $$
7295: 
7296: where:
7297: $$
7298: C_{\text{LSI}}^{\text{kin}} = \frac{1}{2\lambda_{\text{hypo}}}, \quad \lambda_{\text{hypo}} = c \cdot \min\left(\gamma, \frac{\alpha_U}{\sigma_v^2}\right)
7299: $$
7300: 
7301: **Crucially**: This holds for **non-convex** $U(x)$ via hypocoercivity.
